title: error in remDups method - fix error

content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that the method always works as intended?

choices.label: In line 3, changing the Boolean expression to  j < nums.size()
In line 7, changing the Boolean expression to  first != second
In line 9, changing the expression to  nums.remove(j + 1)
In line 10, changing the expression to  j--

content.answer: In line 10, changing the expression to  j--

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
